title: koovi azhaithaal
sahitya:
kUvi azhaittAl kural kOduppAr (kumaran) parankunram Eri ninra kumarA

enru



anupallavi



pUvidazh malarndaruL punnakai purivAn puNNiyam sheidOrkku kaNNediril

terivAn



caraNam



dEviyar iruvar mEviya guhanai tingaLai aNinda shankaran maghanai

pAvaLar yAvarum pADiya vEndanai pon mayil EriDum SaNmukha nAthanai
